item.description:
Kick off the weekend, put on your sexy shoes and join for a fun night as we watch the new Sex and the City 2 at the Lowes Theatre on Boston Common. Then we will celebrate with post movie drinks and appetizers nearby.

This will be a fun night, so don't miss out! We will be attending the 7:30 show, please get your tickets in advance, they will sell out! You can buy them on Fandango, here is the link: http://www.fandango.c...

We will meet inside the main entrance, towards the right. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet inside the main entrance, towards the right. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.name: Ladies Night! Sex and the City 2 Premiere and Drinks!
